ROW.NAME: 一般纳税人防伪税控抵减额、农产品抵扣情况

ROW.DATDSC: select rownum,t.* from ( select nvl(b.shxydm,b.nsrsbh) nsrsbh,b.nsrmc, (select nsrztmc from dm_gy_nsrzt zt where zt.nsrzt_dm=b.nsrzt_dm) nsrzt, min(yymm)||'~'||max(yymm) skny,sum(ncpsgdje) ncpsgdje,sum(bqfse) bqfse, (select swryxm from dm_gy_swry ry where ry.swry_dm=b.ssgly_dm) swry, (select name from v_swjg sw where sw.id=substr(b.zgswj_dm,0,7)) swjg, (select swjgjc from dm_gy_swjg sw where sw.swjg_dm=b.zgswskfj_dm) swskfj from ( select t0.djxh,t0.nsrsbh,t0.nsrmc,to_char(t0.skssqq,'yyyymm') yymm, t0.zgswskfj_dm,t2.ncpsgdje,t3.bqfse from sb_sbb t0, ( /*进项税额 | 农产品收购抵扣额*/ select sbuuid,pzxh,sum(decode(ewbhxh,6,se,0)) ncpsgdje from SB_ZZS_YBNSR_FB2_BQJXSEMX where ewbhxh=6 group by sbuuid,pzxh ) t2, ( /*一般纳税人防伪税控抵减额*/ select sbuuid,pzxh,bqfse from SB_ZZS_YBNSR_FB4_SEDJQK where ewbhxh=1 ) t3 where t0.sbuuid=t2.sbuuid(+) and t0.sbuuid=t3.sbuuid(+) and t0.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','5') and to_char(t0.skssqq,'yyyy-mm')>='[%YM1]' and to_char(t0.skssqq,'yyyy-mm')<='[%YM2]' and t0.zfbz_1='N' ) a,dj_nsrxx b where a.djxh=b.djxh and (substr(b.zgswskfj_dm,1,7) in('[%ZGSWJG]') or substr(b.zgswskfj_dm,1,7) in (select swjg.id from V_SWJG swjg start with swjg.id='[%ZGSWJG]' connect by prior swjg.id=swjg.sjid)) group by nvl(b.shxydm,b.nsrsbh),b.nsrmc, b.nsrzt_dm,b.zgswj_dm,b.zgswskfj_dm,b.nsrzt_dm,b.ssgly_dm order by b.zgswskfj_dm,nvl(b.shxydm,b.nsrsbh),b.nsrmc ) t where not ( nvl(ncpsgdje,0)=0 and nvl(bqfse,0)=0 )
